Submodules¶

prisma.config module¶

Copyright 2017 Prisma crypto currency and its Authors. This file is part of prisma crypto currency. Licensed under the GNU Lesser General Public License, version 3 or later. See LICENSING for details.

prisma.config.create_config()¶

Parse config file with configparser https://docs.python.org/3/library/configparser.html

prisma.manager module¶

prisma.manager.Prisma()¶

Returns PrismaApp instance. This must be defined here, otherwise the program won’t run because of circular dependencies.

Returns:PrismaApp instance.
